name: (de)ctrl
description:
(de)ctrl is a puzzle-platformer where you play as an energetic little robot called Dimm, it navigating it's way through the forest. Beware, your energy is depleting limited your control of it, will you make it through the forest before the batteries run out?

Each action you take drains from your pool. If you use up all your moves you'll need to retry at the last checkpoint.

Note: If your having issues with clipping try the Windows build. You can also press the retry button to get back to before you clipped.

Controls

The game can be controlled with controllers, and keyboard.

KeyboardController← A D → - Move 
Space - Jump 
Z - Hookshot
X - Retry
Enter - Pause←→ - Move 
X(PS4) / A(Xbox)- Jump 
Square(PS4) / X(Xbox) - Hookshot
Triangle(PS4) / Y(Xbox) - Retry
Start - Pause

Tools Used:

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Adobe Photoshop, Indesign, Illustrator
